targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "stars" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "forks" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "watchers" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "total" FROM "issues" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "open" FROM "issues" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "total" FROM "pullrequests" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "open" FROM "pullrequests" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "merged" FROM "pullrequests" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "commits" WHERE repo =  '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "repo" fill(null)
SELECT "open" FROM "issues_labels" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT "open" FROM "issues_labels" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND open > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT "open" FROM "issues_assignees" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT "open" FROM "issues_assignees" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND open > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)

SELECT "open" FROM "pullrequests_assignees" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND open > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)

SELECT "total" FROM "issues_assignees" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT "total" FROM "issues_assignees" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND total > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT "merged" FROM "pullrequests_labels" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT "merged" FROM "pullrequests_labels" WHERE repo = '$repository' AND merged > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
